history.proof: intros x y z H1 H2. eapply Rle_trans. apply H2. shelve.

ctx: intros x y z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, z : R H1 : y = z H2 : x <= y Unable to unify "y = z" with "y <= z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x y z : R, y = z -> x <= y -> x <= z

Premises:
*** [ R : Set ]
eq_Rle_trans_l : forall x y z : R, x = z -> x <= y -> z <= y
IVT_cor : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x <= y -> f x * f y <= 0 -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
IVT : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x < y -> f x < 0 -> 0 < f y -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
Ranalysis5.IVT_interv : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), (forall a : R, x <= a <= y -> continuity_pt f a) -> x < y -> f x < 0 -> 0 < f y -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
Record Metric_Space : Type := Build_Metric_Space { Base : Type; dist : Base -> Base -> R; dist_pos : forall x y : Base, dist x y >= 0; dist_sym : forall x y : Base, dist x y = dist y x; dist_refl : forall x y : Base, dist x y = 0 < -> x = y; dist_tri : forall x y z : Base, dist x y <= dist x z + dist z y } Arguments Build_Metric_Space _%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Rsqrt_exists : forall y : R, 0 <= y -> {z : R | 0 <= z /\ y = zÂ²}
Ranalysis5.leftinv_is_rightinv_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall y : R, f lb <= y -> y <= f ub -> comp f g y = id y) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> lb <= g x <= ub) -> forall x : R, lb <= x <= ub -> comp g f x = id x
Ranalysis5.f_incr_implies_g_incr_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), lb < ub -> (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> comp f g x = id x) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> lb <= g x <= ub) -> forall x y : R, f lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= f ub -> g x < g y
derive_increasing_interv_ax : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (pr : derivable f), a < b -> ((forall t : R, a < t < b -> 0 < derive_pt f t (pr t)) -> forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> x < y -> f x < f y) /\ ((forall t : R, a < t < b -> 0 <= derive_pt f t (pr t)) -> forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> x < y -> f x <= f y)
derive_increasing_interv_var : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (pr : derivable f), a < b -> (forall t : R, a < t < b -> 0 <= derive_pt f t (pr t)) -> forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> x < y -> f x <= f y
Rmin_r : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= y
Ranalysis5.f_interv_is_interv : forall (f : R -> R) (lb ub y : R), lb < ub -> f lb <= y <= f ub -> (forall x : R, lb <= x <= ub -> continuity_pt f x) -> {x : R | lb <= x <= ub /\ f x = y}
Ranalysis5.continuity_pt_recip_prelim : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), lb < ub -> (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall x : R, lb <= x <= ub -> comp g f x = id x) -> (forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> continuity_pt f a) -> forall b : R, f lb < b < f ub -> continuity_pt g b
Rmin_l : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= x
Ranalysis5.continuity_pt_recip_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub : R), lb < ub -> (forall x y : R, lb <= x -> x < y -> y <= ub -> f x < f y) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> comp f g x = id x) -> (forall x : R, f lb <= x -> x <= f ub -> lb <= g x <= ub) -> (forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> continuity_pt f a) -> forall b : R, f lb < b < f ub -> continuity_pt g b
Rmin_pos : forall x y : R, 0 < x -> 0 < y -> 0 < Rmin x y
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Arguments Rmin (_ _)%R_scope
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
Ranalysis5.derive_pt_recip_interv_prelim1_1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R), lb < ub -> f lb < x < f ub -> (forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> lb <= g x <= ub

Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv_prelim1 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R), lb < ub -> f lb < x < f ub -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> (forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) -> (forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) -> (forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> derivable_pt f a) -> derivable_pt f (g x)
Ranalysis5.derive_pt_recip_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (lb_lt_ub : lb < ub) (x_encad : f lb < x < f ub) (f_incr : forall x0 y : R, lb <= x0 -> x0 < y -> y <= ub -> f x0 < f y) (g_wf : forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> lb <= g x0 <= ub) (Prf : forall a : R, lb <= a <= ub -> derivable_pt f a) (f_eq_g : forall x0 : R, f lb <= x0 -> x0 <= f ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) (Df_neq : derive_pt f (g x) (Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv_prelim1 f g lb ub x lb_lt_ub x_encad f_eq_g g_wf f_incr Prf) <> 0), derive_pt g x (Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv f g lb ub x lb_lt_ub x_encad f...
get_signZ = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.neg p => Some (Z.pos p) | _ => None end : Z -> option Z Arguments get_signZ _%Z_scope
IZR = fun z : Z => match z with | 0%Z => R0 | Z.pos n => IPR n | Z.neg n => - IPR n end : Z -> R Arguments IZR _%Z_scope : simpl never
D_x = fun (D : R -> Prop) (y x : R) => D x /\ y <> x : (R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Arguments D_x _%function_scope (_ _)%R_scope
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Arguments R_dist (_ _)%R_scope
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
primitive : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x) -> R -> R
Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_recip_interv_prelim0 : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (Prf : forall a : R, g lb <= a <= g ub -> derivable_pt f a), continuity_pt g x -> lb < ub -> lb < x < ub -> forall Prg_incr : g lb <= g x <= g ub, (forall x0 : R, lb <= x0 <= ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> derive_pt f (g x) (Prf (g x) Prg_incr) <> 0 -> derivable_pt g x
is_upper_bound = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => forall x : R, E x -> x <= m : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Arguments is_upper_bound _%function_scope _%R_scope
Ranalysis5.derivable_pt_lim_recip_interv : forall (f g : R -> R) (lb ub x : R) (Prf : forall a : R, g lb <= a <= g ub -> derivable_pt f a), continuity_pt g x -> lb < ub -> lb < x < ub -> forall Prg_incr : g lb <= g x <= g ub, (forall x0 : R, lb <= x0 <= ub -> comp f g x0 = id x0) -> derive_pt f (g x) (Prf (g x) Prg_incr) <> 0 -> derivable_pt_lim g x (1 / derive_pt f (g x) (Prf (g x) Prg_incr))
RiemannInt_P20 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (h : a <= b) (pr : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x) (pr0 : Riemann_integrable f a b), RiemannInt pr0 = primitive h pr b - primitive h pr a
antiderivative = fun (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) => (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> exists pr : derivable_pt g x, f x = derive_pt g x pr) /\ a <= b : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Arguments antiderivative (_ _)%function_scope (_ _)%R_scope
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match (x ?= y)%Z with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Arguments Zeq_bool (_ _)%Z_scope
RiemannInt_P27 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b x : R) (h : a <= b) (C0 : forall x0 : R, a <= x0 <= b -> continuity_pt f x0), a < x < b -> derivable_pt_lim (primitive h (FTC_P1 h C0)) x (f x)
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
RRle_abs : forall x : R, x <= Rabs x
continuity = fun f : R -> R => forall x : R, continuity_pt f x : (R -> R) -> Prop Arguments continuity _%Rfun_scope
derivable = fun f : R -> R => forall x : R, derivable_pt f x : (R -> R) -> Set Arguments derivable _%Rfun_scope
